# nxos_feature_pim (Data Source)

This data source can read the PIM feature configuration.

- API Documentation: [fmPim](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:Pim/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_feature_pim" "example" {
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `admin_state` (String) Administrative state.
- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.
